name: I Witness (Arveis)
description:
I Witness is an art project game. It's a narrative mystery across the spacetime and various points of view. Delve into the unknown and find what has happened on the Rashomon Research Vessel!

Explore the narrative and let yourself to be drawn into the microcosm of a lonely spaceship amongst the stars,
Discover what really happened on the Rashomon Research Vessel.
Survive - whoever or whatever you are - find your way out of this nightmare.

The game is inspired by the "Rashomon Effect" both in Akira Kurosawa's movie "Rashomon", and the short story "Rashomon" by Ryūnosuke Akutagawa.

If you have found any issues with the title or just want to leave a comment, you can contact me at mel.pietrasik@gmail.com. Cheers!

Credits:
Game - Melchior Pietrasik
Music - Karol "Warp" Andrzejewski
Cover Art - Zuzanna Bartosiak
